# insert(_:)

**Instance Method**

Add a new instance to the container. Returns true if added. Returns false if it already exists.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult mutating func insert(_ instance: MeshResource.Instance) -> Bool
```

## Using the collection

- **count**: Number of instances.
- **isEmpty**: True if there are no instances.
- **remove(id:)**: Remove an instance by name.
- **removeAll()**: Remove all the instances.
- **update(_:)**: Update an existing instance. The old instance is returned.

items.description: True if there are no instances.
